attributes.action: extend the maternity provision to 6 months full pay for all working mothers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many women who are major earners or sole breadwinners are being forced back to work before they are ready due to the massive drop in household income maternity leave can cause. This is not fair, especially when comnpared to the lifestyles of certain stay at home mothers reliant on benefits, and must stop.
